verbose_text: This co-culture resulted in strong CXCR4 expression in F4/80 positive BMMs (XREF_FIG A), and exposure of BMMs to cancer cell conditioned media triggered a marked upregulation of CXCR4 in macrophages (XREF_FIG B and 4C) Crucially, inhibition of transforming growth factor beta (TGF-beta) signaling blocked the induction of CXCR4 mRNA and protein by cancer cell conditioned media (XREF_FIG B and 4C), and TGF-beta was sufficient to induce CXCR4 (XREF_FIG D).
evidence: TGF-beta was sufficient to induce CXCR4
